plain_text:
United States Court of Appeals
                     For the First Circuit


No. 02-2390

                        GEORGE ECONOMOU,

                     Petitioner, Appellant,

                               v.

                       PETER A. PEPE, JR.,

                      Respondent, Appellee.


                          ERRATA SHEET

     The opinion of this Court issued on May 18, 2004 is amended
as follows:

     Page 10, line 29 of footnote 4: "three" should be "there"
